item.title: 20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day
item.description:
20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day

There will be plenty of love in the Wine Country air this Valentine's Day as couples celebrate not just the most romantic day of the year but a three-day weekend thanks to President's Day. We've rounded up 20 romantic things to do in Wine Country-10 in the Napa Valley and 10 in Sonoma County-so you can get started on your Feb.

item.title: Celebrate the 40th Anniversary of Napa Valley's Triumph over French Wines
item.description:
Celebrate the 40th Anniversary of Napa Valley's Triumph over French Wines

Auberge du Soleil is offering a five-course meal and special wine pairings in honor of the historic occasion...

item.title: Napa Offers Hands-On Experience Through April | Patch
item.description:
Napa Offers Hands-On Experience Through April | Patch

NAPA, CA - The City of Napa has unveiled a DoNapa Behind the Scenes for visitors during the next three months. On Wednesdays and Thursdays in February, March and April, visitors can experience hands-on tourism with backstage tours the Uptown Theater or learning a chocolatier's secrets at Anette's Chocolate.

item.title: Four Seasons to Open 2018 in Napa Valley
item.description:
Four Seasons to Open 2018 in Napa Valley

Hotel Development California Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts, Alcion Ventures, and Bald Mountain Development today announced plans for a new luxury resort in Napa Valley. Slated to open in early 2018, the resort will feature 85 guest rooms and 20 Private Residence villas.

item.title: Broncos' Vernon Davis combining art, wine passion with Hill Family
item.description:
Broncos' Vernon Davis combining art, wine passion with Hill Family

Vernon Davis is a tried and true product of the Washington, D.C., area. He grew up during some of its toughest years as the city battled with the nationwide crack epidemic in the 1980s and the separation of its quadrants that followed, pitting the affluent and the disadvantaged on opposite sides of Rock Creek Park.

item.title: NFL legends tackle wine country for second careers
item.description:
NFL legends tackle wine country for second careers

NAPA, Calif. - Charles Woodson discovered the secret to a long and successful National Football League career many years ago. Red wine. "Charles became interested in wine when he was with the Oakland Raiders and they trained near here and he definitely feels it helped him play for as long as he did," Guillermo Corona told USA TODAY Sports on a recent visit to the Napa Valley.

item.title: Hot trend alert: Napa wine lounges, instead of tasting bars
item.description:
Hot trend alert: Napa wine lounges, instead of tasting bars

Posted: 02/04/2016 09:00:00 AM PST Updated: 02/05/2016 01:20:14 PM PST The standard winery tasting bar is so 2012. In Napa and Sonoma, the term tasting room is out -- and "hospitality house" is in. Instead of bellying up to the bar, you relax in intimate living rooms and wine lounges, served by a "wine educator," in lieu of a "pourer."
